backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling access control, user profiles, contacts, birthday-range logic, and gift plans with per‑user storage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summaries describing each frontend file’s functionality.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Comprehensive checklist for validating production deployments on the Internet Computer.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and steps for deploying the app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry.
frontend/scripts/print-live-icp0-url.sh: Script that retrieves the frontend canister ID and prints the live icp0.io URLs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, profile setup, and the tabbed interface for upcoming birthdays, contacts, and gifts.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Form component for creating or updating contact records with validation and submission via hooks.
Manages listing, searching, editing, and deleting contacts with dialogs and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/DomainSlugSugges: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/GiftPlanForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing gift plans, including contact selection, budgeting, recurrence, and validation.
frontend/src/components/GiftsManager.tsx: Manages viewing, updating, sending, editing, and deleting birthday gift plans with status handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that handles login/logout using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/UpcomingDashboar: Dashboard component that displays upcoming birthdays with filters, search, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContacts.ts: React Query hooks for listing, creating, updating, and deleting contacts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDomainConfiguratio: Empty placeholder hook file for domain configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useDomainSlugs.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for domain slug handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftPlans.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on birthday gift plans using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, state management, and identity persistence through a React context provider.
Hook to fetch upcoming birthdays for a given time window using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving and updating the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Utility functions for formatting birthdays and calculating ages and next occurrences.
frontend/src/lib/domainSlug.ts: Empty placeholder module for domain slug utilities.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats nanosecond timestamps into relative or absolute human-readable strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides functions to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, shadows, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including versioning, deployment status, and architectural notes.
